Translations.Text: leaders Pharaoh's ludia said Will ona allow Moses jeho ludia zhnity zem forsake ona tvoj gods He said My kill ich syn rezervny ich dcera! My bol vela mocny than they bol
Moses said do jeho ludia Seek GOD's pomoc steadfastly persevere Zem belongs do GOD He grants it whomever He zvolit si Jeho servants. ultimate victory belongs do the righteous
They said My persecuted before ona pojdem us a ona pojdem us. He said Tvoj Lord annihilate tvoj enemy zriadit ona zem potom He see ako ona behave
